long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web browser extension for the Gloow App. Easily add new information to your domain while browsing the internet and connect it to your domains and nodes.

 	
The usage of the Gloow Browser Extension is very straightforward, simply authenticate in the app, then while coming across an interesting web page, click the extension icon, select the relevant domain and relevant node, or add it as a new node in your knowledge base.
